title: Bacon wrapped chicken and grilled asparagus with red onion and mushroom gravy
ingredients: ['2 chicken breast fillets, fat trimmed', '2 to 3 sprigs rosemary, leaves only, chopped', '4 slices bacon', 'olive oil', 'salt and pepper', '1 red onion, chopped', '4-5 mushrooms, sliced', '1/3 glass red wine', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 handful chicken stock cube, crumbled', '500ml water', '10 to 12 fresh asparagus spears']
